H0.text: when does april fools day end at noon. March 32nd

H1.text: when does april fools day end at noon. January 1st

H2.text: when does april fools day end at noon. February 29th

H3.text: when does april fools day end at noon. April 1st

A4.text: with the custom ceasing at noon, after which time it is no longer acceptable to play pranks.

A5.text: the text of the 'Nun's Priest's Tale' also states that the story takes place on the day when the sun is 'in the sign of Taurus had y-rune Twenty degrees and one,' which would not be 1 April.
